about_the_game:
GOALS is a gameplay-first, free-to-play, cross-play, multiplayer-focused, and esports-ready football game.

GOALS is our tribute to everything football. It’s a game about winning, but one where victory comes in more forms than simply winning matches. No two users will be on the same journey.

GOALS is for everyone, like football can and should be. It’s for the casuals and the pros. For the players, the managers and the fans that live for the game. It’s also for the creators and the trend-setters. Perfect your team's look, show off your own style or just admire the creativity around you. GOALS is everything football.


GAMEPLAY FIRST

Develop your club, build your squad, and evolve together on the field. Every player is unique in both attributes and appearance. Expect a responsive gameplay experience designed to actually feel like football. GOALS is easy to learn, but nearly impossible to fully master.

FREE-TO-PLAY

GOALS is free to play*. Play matches to earn currency, to use in store to generate players. Get new kits, cosmetics and stadiums. Keep the best players in your squad, and exchange the ones you don’t want in Player Exchange Tasks (PET). See your players progress and eventually retire to become club legends. You will also see some of your favorite real life footballers featured in GOALS.

*Applicable platform account and subscription (sold separately) may be required. This game includes optional in-game purchases of virtual currency that can be used to acquire in-game items, including random selections of in-game items.

CROSS-PLAY

GOALS will be playable on Windows, Playstation and Xbox. The playtest is launched on Windows only.

MULTIPLAYER-FOCUSED

Immerse yourself in the exhilarating 1v1 mode or join forces with friends in the fast-paced 5v5 game mode. State-of-the-art netcode minimizes latency to ensure an optimal gaming experience.

ESPORTS READY

Aspire to greatness in GOALS' competitive modes, where you can climb the top 500 leaderboard in Ranked or tackle weekly challenges in Evolution. Take part in tournaments or host your own.

JOIN OUR COMMUNITY

Share your feedback and engage in the discussions at the GOALS Discord

GOALS is still under development. The full game might have elements and assets absent in the alpha.
